title: Unable to Patch (Error code 004)

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Restarted client multiple times, even restarted computer, still shows the same.
I do not use any antivirus software, never experienced this problem until today.

Followed the steps of repairing a 004 error, but it still did not work

replies.body:
never had any issues patching or playing untill this most recent patch i'm getting the same error  004 nothing i'm trying seems to fix it (restart pc) (run as admin) (double check access is allowed in anti virus)(windows fully updated)(un-install re-install) i can log in and chat i can even access the store but i cant patch
edit: i've been using the new client for months now, ever since it first came out. and i played last night so problem arose with some patch that came out today.

I am also having the same exact issue as you except mine started a few days ago. I can login to the game but I keep getting the (Error code 004) message pop up every 10 seconds. I can talk to friends, access the in game store and everything else but start a game, the play button is greyed out and it won't start the patch to allow me to play.
Same issue here. No issues on my side. Except I can't patch or play...

Restarting the client is a safe bet, but it sounds like network is having an issue reaching the patching server.  I'm not sure what steps you used exactly to clear the error, though.  Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear any blocks while trying to get those updates.  Let me know if that helps.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jEGqRWsO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-27T22:29:22.057+0000)
>
> Restarting the client is a safe bet, but it sounds like network is having an issue reaching the patching server.  I'm not sure what steps you used exactly to clear the error, though.  Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear any blocks while trying to get those updates.  Let me know if that helps.

I've tried the Hextech Repair Tool, but it stops working once it's forcing a repatch, the other options in the connection guide were  no good either

I am having this same problem, nothing is blocking on my side. It must be a server issue.

On another note, I am displeased by the new client. I would enjoy having a client revert if possible until there is a better update for the new client.

First, I cannot see my full ip amount anymore, unless there is somewhere else to go and check; that would be redundant.
Second, holiday runes are non-existent now because their images were replaced.
Third, I cannot even update to play.
